sub_title: System Test Engineer at Allegion, PLC
summary:
I am a highly determined and adaptive professional with 4 years of experience in Testing across Firmware, Application software, and Product Testing. Throughout my career, I have acquired the following skills:
☛ Hands-on experience in system testing life-cycle which includes design, develop and implement test plans, test cases and test processes 
☛ ISTQB certified software tester
☛ Familiar with firmware and protocol testing on Electronic locks through RSSimulator, RSI Test tool, Apache server and SUS 
☛ Well versed with defect tracking tools like Seapine Test Track Pro and Visual Studio Enterprise
☛ Good exposure in working with Multimeters and Variable power supplies 
☛ Proficient in all phases of Test Case management tools such as Seapine Test Case Manager and Visual studio
☛ Team player and self-starter with excellent communication, coordination, documentation, project planning and interpersonal skills

TECHNICAL SKILLS:
Programming Languages:	Java, C# and C
Tools & Utilities:	Selenium, Appium, Eclipse, Seapine Test Track Pro, Test Case Manager, Seapine Surround SCM, Visual Studio 2015
Application Packages:	MS office Suite
Operating Systems:	Windows 98/ 2000/ XP

school.name: New Horizon College of Engineering, BANGALORE

certifications.name: ISTQB Foundation level
certifications.authority: INTERNATIONAL SOFTWARE TESTING AND QUALIFICATIONS BOARD LIMITED

projects.title: CISA smart security solutions
projects.description:
CISA systems are designed for all those who want a simple, flexible, tailor-made electronic lock system. CISA is simple, it is a web service and user can program the keys without having to worry about managing the data and the application. CISA is flexible tool in just a couple of clicks you can tailor the whole hospitality system to your needs

Responsibilities:
☛ Participating in functionality and firmware testing of the application
☛ At the verge of automating the web application using selenium

projects.title: Factories and Boilers Information system
projects.description:
The FBIS of Karnataka is a government web service which aims to monitor work environment, ensure workmen safety, health and adequacy of facilities for peoples’ welfare at their work place. It helps monitor the Health of the workmen involved in hazardous operations to prevent occupational diseases

☛ Accountable for writing and reviewing of User Guide documents
